projects.name: PrettyStyle
projects.description: PrettyStyle is an E-Commerce inspired in big websites with the objective of bringing a great experience for the simple customer and the service provider who will make their products available on our platform. We have 2 types of users in our platform, the simple and the business, both have the same functionalities but the business has a product management part where it can register and manage its stock. We have a product catalog based on the products registered by the service provider, through which the user can view the products and buy if they are interested in any.
projects.tecnologies: Java 8, JSP, Expression Languages, Bootstrap, JQuery, Ajax, MySQL, Git Flow, TomCat
